DOC.detailed_description: Once pregnancy recognize , woman seek prompt prenatal care try stop risk behavior . Unfortunately , woman unintended pregnancy recognize pregnancy promptly , inadvertently continue risk behavior vulnerable early pregnancy week . Home pregnancy test rapid inexpensive mean pregnancy diagnosis . The objective study determine whether woman Medicaid population risk unintended pregnancy keep home pregnancy test hand ( necessary ) use appropriately
DOC.criteria: age 18 34 year old female , sexually active , pregnant , desire pregnancy , surgically sterile , intercourse least past 6 month without use effective contraception ( hormonal barrier male vasectomy ) receiving Medicaid OR child Medicaid OR Medicaid pay prev . preg understand written/spoken English enough give informed consent respond survey fail meet inclusion criterion
